articles.title: U2 announce dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live at Sphere' - NME
articles.description: U2 have announced the dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live At Sphere', their first shows for four years. They are the first band to play there.
articles.content:
U2 have confirmed the dates for a run of shows where they will play ‘Achtung Baby’ in full at the new Sphere in Las Vegas.
